name: On my way home (elGrupo8)
description:
On my way home is a platform 2D game with a lateral scroll and pixel art that we, me and my classmates, made as a final proyect of our first year of DAM - VIOD. 

You will control Spikey a teen hedgehog separated from his family by a fire. Help him get home in this adventure facing enemies and finding out new worlds hitherto unknow to him.

Team:

Daniel Moncayo 

Jordi Tomas

Pedro Fernandez
